### Model List

| id  | address  | legnth   | file              |
| --- | -------- | -------- | ----------------- |
| -   | 0x000000 | 0x100000 | firmware          |
| 1   | 0x400000 | 0x200000 | person detection  |
| 2   | 0x600000 | 0x200000 | pet detection     |
| 3   | 0x800000 | 0x200000 | gesture detection |
| 4   | 0xA00000 | 0x400000 | custom            |

### Flash firmware an model

```
pip3 install python-sscma
```

```
sscma.cli flasher --sn
sscma.cli flasher -f firmware.img
sscma.cli flasher -f person.tflite --offset 0x400000
sscma.cli flasher -f pet.tflite --offset 0x600000
sscma.cli flasher -f gesture.tflite --offset 0x800000
sscma.cli flasher -f human_pose.tflite.tflite --offset 0xA00000
```

### Set model infomration

```
AT+MODEL=1
AT+INFO=""

AT+MODEL=2
AT+INFO=""


AT+MODEL=3
AT+INFO=""

AT+MODEL=4
AT+INFO=""

```
